info.+content: 僕のヒーローアカデミア

As the Heroes finally putting faith on the society that had previously damaged from an all-out battle with the Paranormal Liberation Front, All Might requests the America's top Hero, Star and Stripe, to fight Tomura Shigaraki. While the Class 1-A students train to become stronger than before, one of the classmates was revealed to be a spy that makes the situations complicated. With the final battle between Heroes and Villains draws near, Izuku Midoriya and his classmates began its assault as the Pro Heroes plan to divide and conquer the villains' side in deciding the fate of the world.
#1: "Tagatame (誰我為)" by TK from Ling Tosite Sigure
TVアニメ『僕のヒーローアカデミア』
